turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good Afternoon, can you please order me a coffee when you get a chance?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem. From where are we ordering?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in downtown Trenton, NJ.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, Starbucks in Trenton, no problem. What were you looking for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to need a Salted Caramel Mocha latte with 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What size were you looking for.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande is good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande. Go it. Do you want anything else from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. Just the coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll call it in now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. Ask them to put it on my account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. No problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, you're coffee will be ready to be picked up in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you ask them to give me a digital receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they're going to send the receipt through your app.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
